member.name: T:SFGenericModel.Materials.GenericMaterial
member.summary:
Used to store uniform data for . Duplicate uniform names are not allowed, regardless of type differences.
Custom material data should be converted to a to update shader uniforms. Avoid updating shader uniforms directly.

member.name: T:SFGenericModel.GenericMesh`1
member.summary:
A vertex container that supports drawing indexed vertex data using a user defined vertex struct .
Inherit from this class to override the default materials and rendering state.
member.typeparam: The struct used to define vertex data
